pr_title: Prevent fire from spreading to invalid locations

timeline.bodyText: Lets just modify the existing patch adding the line below this so we can avoid another patch file for this.
timeline.author: aikar
timeline.diffHunk:

+From: Mariell Hoversholm <proximyst@proximyst.com>

+Subject: [PATCH] Prevent fire from spreading to invalid locations

++++ b/src/main/java/net/minecraft/server/BlockFire.java
+@@ -197,6 +197,7 @@ public class BlockFire extends BlockFireAbstract {
+                                 }
+ 
+                                 blockposition_mutableblockposition.a((BaseBlockPosition) blockposition, l, j1, i1);
